metadata.name: Magic Items (Nordic Expansion)
metadata.description: Magical artifacts inspired by Nordic mythology and folklore

weapons_and_armor.text: Spear that never misses but returns with knowledge from wherever it strikes
Axe that can split mountains but grows heavier with each swing
Shield made of frozen light that turns attackers to ice sculptures
Helm that grants foresight in battle but blindness to peaceful solutions
Gauntlets that can catch lightning and reshape it into weapons

fate_objects.text: Thread that, when woven into clothing, binds the wearer's fate to a specific purpose
Well water that shows reflections of possible futures when drunk
Runestone that rearranges its markings to answer one question per season
Loom that weaves the life threads of those nearby, allowing manipulation of their destinies
Bone dice that always predict the outcome of the next important choice

transformation_items.text: Cloak of raven feathers that transforms the wearer into a bird at twilight
Belt that grants the strength of ten warriors but the hunger of twenty
Necklace of bear teeth that allows shapeshifting during the full moon
Drinking horn that fills with mead that transforms drinkers according to their true nature
Boots that turn the wearer's footsteps into whatever terrain they most need

elemental_artifacts.text: Hammer that summons storms but requires a personal sacrifice with each use
Cauldron that brews potions from emotions poured into it
Torch that burns with the cold fire of the underworld, freezing instead of burning
Stone that controls the tides when placed in water
Flute carved from a world-tree branch that can summon or dismiss winds

binding_objects.text: Chain forged from whispers that can bind anything, even concepts or ideas
Ribbon woven from moonlight that, once tied, cannot be broken until a specific condition is met
Ring that binds the wearer's life force to another person, sharing wounds and healing
Rope made from a sea serpent's beard that can capture creatures from any realm
Shackles that bind not the body but the shadow, preventing the captive from leaving

wisdom_artifacts.text: Eye in a jar that grants visions of hidden knowledge when gazed upon
Mead that bestows poetic ability but takes a memory with each sip
Severed head that speaks wisdom but only through riddles
Staff carved with runes that reveal themselves only to those who have suffered greatly
Bowl that fills with water showing the reflection of those who possess knowledge you seek

journey_items.text: Boat that can sail through earth and air as easily as water
Compass that points to the holder's greatest desire rather than north
Shoes that leave no tracks but take the wearer on unexpected detours
Map that shows not where things are but where they will be
Walking stick that knows the way to any destination but chooses whether to reveal it
